body_html:
The peephole connections are vectors that represent the diagonal of a matrix; so an orthonormal initialization for these would be a vector of all ones. The solution is to fix the orthonormal initializer so you can decide how to treat vectors.

body:
The peephole connections are vectors that represent the diagonal of a
matrix; so an orthonormal initialization for these would be a vector of all
ones.  The solution is to fix the orthonormal initializer so you can decide
how to treat vectors.
